original_text: The wheels were made like a chariot wheel; their axles, their rims, their spokes, and their hubs were all cast.
korean_text: 그 바퀴의 구조는 병거 바퀴의 구조 같은데 그 축과 테와 살과 통이 다 부어 만든 것이며

sentences.original_text: The wheels were made like a chariot wheel
their axles, their rims, their spokes
and their hubs were all cast.
